definition: used in rare Japanese place names such as 袮宜町 Minorimachi and 袮宜田 Minorita
the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]

sentences.english: What the fuck are you thinking about?
sentences.chinese: 该死的，袮到底在想什么呀？

sentences.english: I renew my love for you, trusting in your guiding hand.
sentences.chinese: 我重申对你的爱，坚信袮的引导。

sentences.english: Just a cleansed channel For Thy life through me.
sentences.chinese: 作一洁净器皿，流出袮生命。

sentences.english: Your Incarnation fills me with hope.
sentences.chinese: 袮道成肉身用希望填充我们。

sentences.english: Do you ask me to express me which part performance to be fond of most ?
sentences.chinese: 袮要我说出我最喜欢哪一部份的表演吗？

sentences.english: Petition: Jesus, Good Shepherd, give me the grace to open my heart to your mercy.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣，善牧，求袮恩宠于我敞开心扉接纳袮的仁慈。

sentences.english: Petition: Jesus, Good Shepherd, give me the grace to open my heart to your mercy.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣，善牧，求袮恩宠于我敞开心扉接纳袮的仁慈。
爱过袮，妳就是硪一辈子啲宝贝。

sentences.english: I cannot cry, Because you know that weakness in your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 皒県敢哭，因为在袮眼里那昰皒旳弱点。

sentences.english: But that Thy blood was shed for me.
If I gave my love to U .
For beauty in nature, Your glory we see.
sentences.chinese: 在美丽的自然中，我们看到袮的荣耀。

sentences.english: I want to remember you just now in this dim light of night neither.
sentences.chinese: 硪乜罘想甾这种夜色中才想起袮。

sentences.english: So then, death is at work in us, but life is at work in you.
sentences.chinese: 所以，死亡是在我们里面工作，但生命在于袮。

sentences.english: Has you to accompany in the side, is as if not that bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 有袮在身边陪伴，似乎也不褆那么倒楣。

sentences.english: The tear lets me know the agony losing you.
sentences.chinese: 眼泪让皒明白失佉袮悳痛苦。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
old name for the Dadu River 大渡河[Da4 du4 He2] in Sichuan
zedoary (Curcuma zedoaria), plant rhizome similar to turmeric
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "keum"), an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
